meta.description: Optimize the number of regular and special sandwiches to maximize profit given egg and bacon constraints.

sets.name: SANDWICHES
sets.description: Types of sandwiches made by the breakfast joint.

params.name: eggs_required
params.description: Number of eggs required for each type of sandwich.

params.name: bacon_required
params.description: Number of bacon slices required for each type of sandwich.

params.name: profit
params.description: Profit for each type of sandwich.

params.name: total_bacon
params.description: Total number of bacon slices available.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of each type of sandwich to make.

objective.name: max_profit
objective.description: Maximize the total profit from making sandwiches.

constraints.name: egg_constraint
constraints.description: Total eggs used cannot exceed available eggs.

constraints.name: bacon_constraint
constraints.description: Total bacon slices used cannot exceed available bacon.
